title: phone stuck in fast reboot mode
content: i am stuck in fast reboot mode- realized that it was rebooting then stuck on the g screen trying to launch so i accessed the menus that the troubleshooting menus mentioned and i have only selected recovery mode, start mode, reboot mode and reboot mode from the other menu with the factory reset data option. Now i am far from a android tech but i want to understand if stuck in fastboot mode with status as locked - how do i do the OT SIDE INSTALL- i know that thats not the correct name for the steps the others were using but i want to better understand what they are talking about and i guess if i have to factory reset to fixthis problem if there is anyway to make sure i have backed up all of my data from the phones files and documents apps from my laptop in my google account because i am right in the middle of a tax audit which is due in 2 days and i had just completely uploading all of my proofs and was just waiting for the holiday weekend to be over so that i could fax them....... it took over 2 weeks for me to collect and gather evrything and not to mention the notary public documents! please help thank u
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
